Name: Routed drug
Description: A routed drug is a drug as administered to the body via a particular route (such as orally or intravenously).

Properties.Name: Marketed formulations
Properties.Description: Formulations of this routed drug that are available in the market.

Properties.Name: Route of administration
Properties.Description: The route of administration, or path by which this drug is brought into contact with the body.

Properties.Name: Routed drug of
Properties.Description: The drug that this is a routed version of.
